website_summaries.verdict: This tried and trusted glass cleaner comes with a spray bottle, a jumbo refill, and a small price tag so windows, doors, and other surfaces need never go without a sparkle and a shine.
pros: Dependable cleaning performance from a well-known brand
Multipurpose cleaning action can be used for more than just glass
Original formula with patented Ammonia D tackles tough grime and leaves surfaces sparkling and streak-free
Spray bottle and extra large refill combo offers great value for money
cons: If you’re sensitive to chemicals, the smell might bother you

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR REFILLS ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Box was intact, no damage to box at all. Opened up and it was leaking. Upon further review, the smaller bottle trigger/sprayer was broken off and unusable. If need a smaller bottle, don't buy this one. This is good for refills only
customer_reviews.author: 19Laurie73

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CLEANING GUNK OFF CAST IRON.
customer_reviews.text: I use the bottom stove drawer to let pans that have caked on GUNK soak in WINDEX. It works like a CHARM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Windex good, spray bottle bad.
customer_reviews.text: Its windex, so it works. But the spray bottle that came with it broke the first time using it. Dont buy this for the spray bottle, IT IS JUNK. But its windex, so if you need extra, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Nice price and a refill too
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack. It gives you both a spray bottle and the refill as well. Windex works very well and now you get a refill too. The price was nice too.
customer_reviews.author: stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: windex works great for cleaning off exhaust on your windows.
customer_reviews.author: Cleaning lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can refill my smaller spray bottle. Great price. Delivered to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not damged or busted upon arrival, appreciated 👍🏻😃 what can one say it cleans glass
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Morris

customer_reviews.title: I use on my glass and granite and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's Windex. It is what it says it is. I use on my glass and granite and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Denise HTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift She was very happy! Ty :)
customer_reviews.author: Susie A. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP TACTICS...missing the TRIGGER SPRAY in my package
customer_reviews.text: Trigger spray is missing in my pacakage...why are you playing cheap tactics ??
customer_reviews.author: Gayatri Atluri

customer_reviews.title: Its fine. I made the mistake of purchasing to much ...
customer_reviews.text: Its fine. I made the mistake of purchasing to much but thats not a flaw of the product but a personal error.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong formulation
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Windex original, but was sent the Complete formulation. Wouldn't matter so much except I just had an acrylic shower installed and they were very clear to only buy the products and brands specified on their list as safe for acrylic. Returning. Product was packaged fine, just not what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the windex bottle with it? I thought it was included lol
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Great but only for certain surfaces
customer_reviews.text: It is a good price but people overuse Windex. It is for glass and steel. Plastic, painted metal, paint, painted ceramics and plain ceramics, wood, etc. are eaten away by the product (same as Coke -- you can use it to clean oil from a car engine). So be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Laurens R. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I Will never order this product. It took so long to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a good price. Prompt shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off!
customer_reviews.text: The big windex bottle came half empty. I was ripped off!
customer_reviews.author: William C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best Glass cleaner available on the market !
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to glass cleaner, there is nothing better than the Windex brand. It's like Kleenix for tissues . We have tons of glass in our home - glass sliding glass doors, arched windows, coffee tables, mirrors - the list goes on and on. We go through Windex like Milk - did I mention cleaning the window for our six cars - 4 children and our vehicles !
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It arrived fast that's what i call service!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as advertised, on time delivery and great value
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir T

customer_reviews.title: Cleans like no other
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to say. Windex is the best window cleaner and this was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: magic

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as described but still good value
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I thought the large jug was going to be the original windex with ammonia D also ,. But small bottle is the only one with it
customer_reviews.author: Gary   Watson

customer_reviews.title: incredible value for name brand Windex
customer_reviews.text: wow what a great value for a name brand product thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: puppy9

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find gallon size refills. This was a good purchase at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: DenniG

customer_reviews.title: Lots of product, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Large size, good value. I rarely have to repurchase given the amount you receive, and I like having to buy fewer spray bottles and refilling instead, much more economical and less wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for all your needs. I am sure that is all I need to say.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Tischendorf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed and Thank You so much!! I would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: danny hall

customer_reviews.title: Windex
customer_reviews.text: GREAT , What else can be said about this product . It is in my opinion the very best glass cleaner .
customer_reviews.author: 6Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Windows
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you remind to tighten bottles or wrap separately
customer_reviews.author: Starlette

customer_reviews.title: It's windex. Not much to say. Cleans glass ...
customer_reviews.text: It's windex. Not much to say. Cleans glass surfaces very well.
customer_reviews.author: J704581

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive Windex Complete. This is original Windex. Very upset about the false advertising!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be at a reasonable price and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
